ingredients.note: adjust for preference, and possibly sub honey or maple syrup

instructions.name: Heat the vinegar mixture
instructions.text: In a small saucepan, stir together the vinegar, water, salt and your desired amount of sweetener. Cook over medium-high heat until the mixture reaches a simmer. (Or alternately, you can heat the mixture in the microwave.)

instructions.name: Combine in a jar
instructions.text: Place the thinly-sliced onions in a mason jar. Pour the hot vinegar mixture over the onions, screw on the lid, and shake the onions briefly until they are evenly coated with the vinegar mixture.

instructions.name: Marinate
instructions.text: Let the onions marinate for 30 minutes. (You may need to press the onions down with a spoon so that they are all submerged under the vinegar mixture.)

instructions.name: Serve
instructions.text: Serve immediately, or refrigerate the onions in a sealed container for up to 2 weeks.
